entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a character who is staring transfixed at his image in the mirror. He is described as wearing paisley pyjamas and holding several cups.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who steps aside to let Ron look in the mirror. He is mentioned as being unable to see his family when Ron is in front of the mirror.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as someone who used to wear a badge that Ron now has on in the mirror.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are interacting with each other, with Ron excitedly looking at Harry after seeing his image in the mirror.
Ron's image in the mirror shows him wearing a badge that Bill used to wear, indicating a similarity between them.
